replies.replyComment:
@isam isam 
Lankawa kiyana rate mulma janathawa sinhalu. A unata  sinhala miniha anith jathintath laginna dunna.
 Ape muthun miththan karapu me awhinsawadee manushiya weda nisa ada  apima beta kanawa.
 Thamun nodanna lankawe ithihasayath lankawata muslim waru aawa hetith hondata igena ganna.
  Ita passe molayak thiyenawanam  kondak thiyenawanam aayeth kagen hari ahanna sinhalu witharada inna ona kiyala.
muslim kattiya lankawe inda hoda nehe singhala minissu vitarak inda one
Muslim gahala alawannda one munge pake lokukakam
